meta.name: description
meta.content: The mission of the Athens City School System, in partnership with the community, is to provide opportunities for all students to develop intellectually, socially, physically and morally in order to live as a contributing member of an ever changing, multi-cultural society.

li.a: TN Statutory Rights of Students and Parents

img.alt: supervisor and principal of the year

div.div: With an abundance of caution and communication with McMinn County Schools, Etowah City Schools, other surrounding Southeast Districts, local and state health officials and considering the concerns related to COVID-19, Athens City Schools will be closed for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year as a preemptive attempt to slow the spread of the virus. This includes all school activities and Kids Connection. We will continue to monitor this fluid situation and provide updates as they become available. Thank you for your patience and understanding.

h3.a: FREE Drive-thru Breakfast and Lunch Available
Pre K Registration- Contact 745-1516 to Register
